name: Square-Mate (Web-GL)
description:
You need to be in fullscreen mode for the game to play correctly!

Spikey guys have kidnapped your grandpa! Quick, gather your fellow squares to save him! Lead your three colored squares through the levels, but be careful of the spiked enemies! Press buttons and unlock gates to reach the door. 

Controls:

  • AD or <- -> to move
  • W or Up Arrow to jump
  • Scroll Wheel or Number Keys to switch players
  • P - Pause
  • R - Restart

This game is a Web-GL version of the game I made for the Brackeys Game Jam.
